tweets.text:
Let’s be honest: this site is worse than ever. A lot of friends have rightfully abandoned this mismanaged mess.

But we are having good, productive, friendly conversations over on Mastodon!

Join us!

I’m at https://t.co/eMCgQTLQYR

“11ty was the only purely static site generator (SSG) in our survey to show growth in usage share. For this reason we think 11ty is now the clear choice if a static site is your use case.”

—Jamstack Community Survey 2022

https://t.co/NP5M0swESD
